234  template <typename T>
235  inline T getValue() const
236  {
237  try {
238  return fromString<T>( mValue );
239  } catch ( boost::bad_lexical_cast &) {
240  throw ExcNonConvertible( * this );
241  }
242  return (T)0; // Unreachable. Prevents warning.
243  }
244 
246  const std::string& getValue() const { return mValue; }
247

276  class Exception : public cinder::Exception

281  class ExcChildNotFound : public JsonTree::Exception {
282  public:
283  ExcChildNotFound( const JsonTree &node, const std::string &key ) throw();
284  virtual const char* what() const throw()
285  {
286  return mMessage;
287  }
288 
289  private:
290  char mMessage[ 2048 ];
291  };
292 
294  class ExcNonConvertible : public JsonTree::Exception {
295  public:
296  ExcNonConvertible( const JsonTree &node ) throw();
297  virtual const char* what() const throw()
298  {
299  return mMessage;
300  }
301 
302  private:
303  char mMessage[ 2048 ];
304  };
